title: Constant lag, but only in league (internet is fine)
body:
As of right now, I have a mostly consistent ping of around 120 that will randomly jump up to around 4-500. The weird thing is that I can play much more demanding games like Overwatch completely fine with minor to no lag. I ran several ping tests and they all came back with 30 - 40 ping

Here is a list of things I have already done to try to address the problem:
* Reset my modem (I also unplugged and re-plugged all of the cables on it and to my computer)
Reinstalled League of Legends 
 Ran the Hextech repair tool
* 
I also did the standard things like lower the settings and shut down background processes to no avail{{item:3070}} {{champion:82}} 

Any help or feedback is greatly appreciated!

_Thanks_

replies.body: It sounds like you're having a network problem like packet loss that's causing you to have sudden spikes in ping.  Resetting your modem is a good start, but those other steps would resolve game file issues and not really your network.  Instead, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches to get an analysis of your specific case.  Let me know what you find!

So here is where things get interesting. When I uploaded the log files, it said that my packet loss was up to 6%. But when I tested for packet loss in the command prompt, I lost none. 
I'm going to run a longer packet loss test again and I'll let you know the results when it is finished. 
Thanks for the help so far!
Update: I ran an extended packet loss test and I'm still not losing any. any Ideas what the problem is?

I am having the same problem, but for me it will start at around 30ms, which is normal for me, but then at some point in the game it will jump up to a constant 135-140 and won't go back down. Any ideas as to how to fix this. 

This is a recent problem for me, maybe just the past 3 days of this.

I have run repairs, i have changed many windows settings, adjusted firewall. Ever since last patch I have been laggin constantly, sits at around 200 then spikes as high as 2050ms and it is unplayable. I am not the only one, everygame there is a few laggers and I havent seen any posts from riot explaining what this might be. I know this game has suffered lag but this is ridiculous, a game based on quick precise casting and Im limping through games with auto attackers and just praying. Cmon rito, help us
